original_text: they love to be greeted with respect in the marketplaces and to be called ‘Rabbi’ by others.
korean_text: 시장에서 문안 받는 것과 사람에게 랍비라 칭함을 받는 것을 좋아하느니라

sentences.original_text: they love to be greeted with respect
and to be called 'Rabbi' by others
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다른 사람들에게 '랍비'라고 불리는 것을 좋아합니다
